name: KPV
overview: A tripeptide (three amino acids) derived from alpha-melanocyte stimulating hormone (α-MSH). Research has explored its anti-inflammatory properties, particularly in the gastrointestinal tract.
side_effects_common: minimal side effects reported in limited studies
who_should_avoid: severe autoimmune conditions without medical oversight
interactions_notes: Limited interaction data available. May affect inflammatory pathways. Discuss with clinician if taking immunosuppressive medications or anti-inflammatory drugs.
dosing_ranges_literature: Research protocols have explored oral doses of 500-1000 mcg daily, or subcutaneous doses of 200-500 mcg. Human clinical data is very limited.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20°C or colder). After reconstitution, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.
